text: Family Relations () is a 1981 Russian Ukrainian drama movie directed by Nikita Mikhalkov (who also stars) and also starring Ivan Bortnik, Nonna Mordyukova, Svetlana Kryuchkova, Yuri Bogatyryov, Oleg Menshikov, Vsevolod Larionov. It was distributed by Mosfilm. ==Other websites== * Category:1981 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Ukrainian movies Category:Movies directed by Nikita Mikhalkov
title: Family Relations
